name: Slimes.io - 3D Color io game
description:
Paint the map in 90 seconds. Can you sweep over others?

The hottest & addictive game!

Color as you move, splash others and level up to color more. Show them who is the biggest jelly slime cube! You must paint more than everyone else in 90 seconds to win.
publishers: ALICTUS YAZILIM EGITIM BILISIM TEKNOLOJILERI ELEKTRONIK SANAYI VE TICARET
